Certainly! Here's a short description for your extension:

Content Disabler

The Content Disabler Chrome extension offers a seamless solution to enhance your browsing experience. Easily toggle the visibility of images and advertisements on webpages with just a click, reducing visual clutter and distractions. Whether you're focusing on reading articles, studying, or simply seeking a cleaner browsing environment, Content Disabler empowers you to customize your web content effortlessly. Enjoy a cleaner, more focused browsing experience today with Content Disabler.
